metadata.name: Timeless #120
metadata.description: Luca Benites, the artist who has burnt into ashes his lifework, going through an existential questioning about the pass of time and the irreversible nature of life, is now exploring the possibilities of blockchain. Time̶l̶e̶s̶s, a dynamic NFT project, a real time artwork, the word “time” handwritten by Luca will vanish through a 30 days process, April 1st to 30th 2022. Buyers of each NFT will receive a physical artwork, numbered and signed by the artist, with the equivalent frame at the moment of purchase. The last NFT will be auctioned and will be accompanied by the complete physical artwork with all the frames of the process. For more information and to redeem physical artworks: www.lucabenites.com
